title: ICE: region parameterization should have inferred that this type is RP

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
``` rust
type Node = int;

trait NodeBase<'self> {
    fn base_node(&'self self) -> &'self Node;
}

impl NodeBase<'self> for float {
    fn base_node(&self) -> &Node {
        fail!("woo")
    }
}

fn main() {
}
```
